org.apache.ignite.igfs

Class IgfsPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.igfs.IgfsPath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, Comparable<IgfsPath>

    public final class IgfsPath
extends Object
implements Comparable<IgfsPath>, Externalizable
    IGFS path to file in the file system. For example, to get information about a file you would use the following code: 
         IgfsPath dirPath = new IgfsPath("/my/working/dir");
     IgfsPath filePath = new IgfsPath(dirPath, "file.txt");

     // Get metadata about file.
     IgfsFile file = igfs.info(filePath);
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
